body: Wow, a scumbag husband .... Damn, uh dafuq!!! WTF is this shit! That is quite fucked up yo. Well, thx for the summary @shadowfairy. Both made a lot of mistakes and wow... just WOW, crazy fuckers.

Two years later, FMC manages to reclaim a family life w/ Saku, they have a kid too. W/ a newfound goal of helping troubled ppl just like she once was, she becomes a marriage counselor. Her hair color's back to normal & she has cut it short. Her new client is a woman who found evidence of her husband Shun cheating on her. After that she couldn't get in touch w/ him. She wants to divorce as soon as possible, they weren't having sex nor have kids anyways. FMC thinks it's similar to her past situation & asks to look at the evidence, it's a black mask & his phone. She finds videos of herself & that time at the orgy party. PTSD seems to kick in. FMC admits that this woman is her to her client who's confused. She gets tired & goes home for the day (unclear whether she helped client before or not), thinking things will be fine. End.

Later on, she's seen talking to Toma, FMC agrees to do orgy videos as a "married wife who broke up w/ her husband" for basic living expenses & stay at Toma's place. She dies her hair blond too. Four months later she meets up w/ Saku again. They catch up a little. Saku's gotten a new part-time job. FMC said she went back to her old place to grab some things & found divorce papers. Divorce was hard on her, she couldn't do anything about it. She had hoped she could go back to the way things were, peaceful days. Maybe it was all an illusion. Saku says that's not true, her love was real. Both of them have changed. Saku wants to live w/ FMC, FMC doesn't want to be troubling again. Saku has never thought of her that way, & asks her out.

Summary (cont.): Saku says that FMC just wished for a peaceful life as a couple w/ Shun despite her sexual urges. But bc of Shun's tactics she ended up cheating on him. Shun remarks that Saku's been a good advisor to FMC; he snidely says it's certainly diff from his hypocritical lifestyle of cumming inside another man's wife. He looks forward to contacting them again. Toma comments that there's scumbags like Shun out there but basically it's not their job to worry about that sort of thing. Toma says that Saku worries too much & that he can't cut it as a 'sex advisor.' It'll only get harder for him from here on out.

FMC wakes up, throws up, & tries to look for her pill to take after the orgy but Shun comes in to have his way w/ her again (just like in a previous chapter), but FMC mistakes him for someone else. Shun is demeaning her while doing so & makes her take a pill (not sure whether birth control pill or some other drug). Shun takes her to a love hotel while she's passed out.

Summary: Following from the previous part where FMC's (Rika) husband (Shun) dumped her. She's drinking her sorrows away w/ random men while letting them have their way. Then Toma (one of Rika's sex advisors) lets in a masked man who he calls 'S-san' & his group in, they begin to get rough w/ her including asphixiation, she calls to Shun to save her as they get into a large orgy w/ her.

S-san takes off his mask & it turns out to be Shun himself. He asks Saku (Rika's other sex advisor, the one she had raw sex w/ in the car last chapter) that he'll call them again when he wants another 'party.' He explains his situation: basically he let FMC escalate into this situation bc the excitement/lust was gone to him, as a wife. FMC would be wasted on him only. It doesn't matter what his attitude on this situation is, as to him it's just sex & he wanted to make her into a woman that he could lust for once again.

Let us pray that we will be never be as autistically retarded as vanillafag SoulNoEffect who can't separate hentai logic from real life and goes on sperging a wall of text talking about fictional porn characters as if they are real life people. Amen.

There is a quote terrorist original meme quote.

Buy a person a plane ticket, they will fly somewhere for a day.
Kick a kidnapped person out of that plane, they will fly for the rest of their life.

Last image: Her alone: She bought that plane ticket. ( Final image )

Basically the man that appears in the mask is HER husband, and records her betrayal releases it online she never self reflected.
She get with the asshole blonde in the car who she cheats with one night. Who confesses
She tries to get a family life with him.
She could of asked her husband to do more kinky things instead; toys to spice up their life.
THE LAWS DONT PROTECT YOU from other countries publishing news on porn or linking ID.
SHE can't find peace, ( family, work, or happiness cause she chose to be in a sewer )
SHE was so mentally broken about her breakup she fucked all those guys expecting her husband to be a cuck forever.

Her husband; moved on.
She lied, betrayed him.
It was only supposed to be 1 or 2 things.
None of the men are partners in life as financial support she lost her flat/home.
She choose suffering over 'settling down' and realizes SEX dophamines was not worth the rest of her 70+ years of life shame.
Can anyone explain what happened in the middle to the last part?
Would have loved to see her suffer more
@elzenpai what? there is good ending in rape?
@ss4chris wouldn’t surprise me, all the past work of the author have “unfulfilled” finals like “it’s just a END and that’s it” or just a bittersweet final, never what one call a “good ending”.
